TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 694
TEI.2.document_title: E St. J Hawkins to Stephen F Austin, 09-13-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Edmund St. John Hawkins to Austin, September 12, 1831. Draft for $20 to pay board bill.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 694

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Edmund St. John Hawkins to Austin, September 12, 1831. Draft for $20 to pay board bill.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col S. F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Please pay to *person_mentioned*Mr Westall*/person_mentioned* 20 dollars the amount of my Boarding. *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-12-1831">September the 12, 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Edmund St John Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Endorsed by Austin:] Paid to *person_mentioned*Hawkins */person_mentioned*twenty dollars in cash in addition to the within—*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="09-13-1831">Septr. 13, 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
